The FI Formula: Explained

Financial Independence boils down to a simple equation: Annual Expenses × 25 = FI Number.

This multiplier assumes a 4% safe withdrawal rate...

Steps to Calculate:

  1. Calculate annual expenses.
  2. Multiply by 25 to find your FI number.
  3. Estimate your timeline using our calculators!
